name: A possible landscape (60x84)
description: Physical drawing + svg source file. This drawing of a landscape was generated from code, and drawn by a robot. Each drawing is unique. 60 x 84cm. Hand signed by the artist. One drawing is available at a time, once purchased, the next drawing is revealed. The drawings are being made in an exhibition space in Madrid as part of “Paisajes de luz”, Lemercier’s solo show at Foundation Telefonica (Feb-July 2021). All drawings will be shipped after the end of the exhibition. International shipping included. DM me with verified HEN account for shipping details. The collector will receive a second OBJKT with the SVG file: if the original drawing is ever lost, stolen or damaged, it can be recreated from the SVG source file.
